GENERIC.hintKeyPressIgnored:
The heating device has been configured that it will not react to a remote control!

See config parameter Manu-/Party mode prioritization

KEY.description_1: With a short or long button press the heating thermostat will be switched to the selected operation mode

VIRTUAL_KEY.description_1: With a short or long button press the heating thermostat will be switched to the selected operation mode
